mapper.select:
select
distinct
from CRM.FIN_OPR_REGISTER
order by ${orderByClause}
select r.* from fin_opr_register r inner join COM_PATIENTINFO cp on r.card_no=cp.card_no where r.valid_flag = '1' and cp.crmid = #{patientId} and r.hospital_id=cp.hospital_id order by reg_date desc
